:py:mod:`demonlist.exceptions`
==============================

.. py:module:: demonlist.exceptions

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Custom exceptions.



Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: WrongCredentials

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`

   Raised if the user entered the wrong data to login.


.. py:exception:: NotLoggedIn

   Bases: :py:obj:`Exception`

   Raised if the user is not logged into the account.
